name: bitscord
description:
Bitscord

This is just a silly joke game about the Bitsy Discord, who are a real friendly, warm, and silly bunch all brought together by the Bitsy Game Engine by Adam Le Doux.

Sorry for all the people I missed and for not saying much about some people! 

Also sorry it looks like a 2-year-old wrote the misaligned blocky text, I made this pretty fast. And was lazy.

The only controls are the Arrow Keys or WASD. 

Hacks used:

  • Transparent Sprites (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
  • Exit from Dialog (by mildmojo)
  • Permanent items (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
References

Bitsy Game Engine by Adam Le Doux

Borksy by A. Yolland

Bitsy Discord
